mapper.select: select ad_no, c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_job, ad_count, ad_appl from (select ad_no, c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_job, ad_count, ad_appl from rec_company c , rec_ad ad where c.c_name = ad.ad_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1 order by ad_date) where rownum <= 5

select ad_no, c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_job, ad_count, ad_appl from (select ad_no, c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_job, ad_count, ad_appl from rec_company c , rec_ad ad where c.c_name = ad.ad_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1 order by ad_count desc) where rownum <= 5

select ad_no, c_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_star from (select ad_no, c_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_star, row_number() over(order by ad_date asc) as rnum from rec_ad join rec_company on ad_name = c_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1) where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}

select * from (select * from (select ad_no, ad_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_loc, c_addr, ad_job, ad_carr, ad_emp, ad_skill, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_deals, ad_pro, ad_cp, ad_ect, row_number() over(order by ad_date asc) as rnum from rec_ad join rec_company on ad_name = c_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1) where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}) where rownum=1

select * from (select ad_no, c_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_star, rownum rn from (select ad_no, c_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_star from rec_ad join rec_company on ad_name = c_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1 order by c_star desc, ad_date)) where rn between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}

select * from (select * from (select ad_no, ad_name, ad_title, ad_date, c_star, c_loc, c_addr, ad_job, ad_carr, ad_emp, ad_skill, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_deals, ad_pro, ad_cp, ad_ect, rownum rn from (select * from rec_ad join rec_company on ad_name = c_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1 order by c_star desc, ad_date)) where rn between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}) where rownum=1
select count(ad_no) from rec_ad where to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1

select * from (select rownum rn, c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_skill, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_count, ad_appl, ad_job, ad_no from (select * from rec_company c , rec_ad ad where c.c_name = ad.ad_name and to_date(ad_date, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI')-sysdate > -1 order by ad_date)) where rn between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
select count(*) from rec_company c , rec_ad ad where c.c_name = ad.ad_name
select c_name, c_loc, c_addr, c_star, ad_skill, ad_upmu, ad_lien, ad_date, ad_title, ad_count, ad_appl, ad_job, ad_no from rec_company c , rec_ad ad where c.c_name = ad.ad_name and ad_no = #{ad_no}
mapper.update: update rec_ad set ad_count = ad_count + 1 where ad_no = #{ad_no}
